long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Drag an image to resize it.
Currently only supports direct images (meaning, an image element), so sites that hide images under other elements like Twitter or Instagram might not work.
I do however plan to try and add that functionality in the future.

Program icon created by myself using assets from Adobe Stock and from xSpeedx on https://imgbin.com/png/VTiLBPbt
Also uses Jquery 3.4.1

You can view the source code, report bugs, and contribute changes at https://github.com/eladavron/Drag2Resize
